# How to built an app with reactive native

## Follow the [tutorial](https://reactnative.dev/docs/getting-started)

This section explain basic components

## Follow the [youtube video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ACpqQR3lQg&list=PL8kfZyp--gEXs4YsSLtB3KqDtdOFHMjWZ&ab_channel=ProgrammingwithMash)

### [environment-setup](https://reactnative.dev/docs/environment-setup)

Follow the "React Native CLI Quickstart"

#### To start  

* Open VS code  
    * Go to project space  
* Open 1st terminal > npx react-native start  
* Split screen 2nd terminal > emulator -avd Pixel_4_XL_API_29_Note7Pro  
    * look for small icon next to first terminal  
* Open 3rd terminal > npx react-native run-android
